de.unipassau.im.ontoint.proposals
Class DetailedClassification<T,K>

java.lang.Object
  de.unipassau.im.ontoint.proposals.DetailedClassification<T,K>
Type Parameters:
T - the feature class
K - the category class
public final class DetailedClassification<T,K>
extends java.lang.Object

Instances of this class wrap a collection of classifications in order to give easy access to the mapping of categories and their probabilities.

Author:
Philipp Nolte
